channel.title: tar on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in tar on Mark Needham

item.title: Unix: tar - Extracting, creating and viewing archives
item.description: $ wget http://dist.neo4j.org/neo4j-community-1.9.2-unix.tar.gz $ tar -xvf neo4j-community-1.9.2-unix.tar.gz $ wget http://dist.neo4j.org/neo4j-community-1.9.2-unix.tar.gz -o - | tar -xv $ tar -cvzpf neo4j-football.tar.gz neo4j-football/ $ ls -alh neo4j-football.tar.gz -rw-r--r-- 1 markhneedham staff 526M 22 Aug 23:38 neo4j-football.tar.gz $ tar --exclude "data*" --exclude "neo4j-community*" --exclude ".git" -cvzpf neo4j-football.tar.gz neo4j-football/ $ ls -alh neo4j-football.tar.gz -rw-r--r-- 1 markhneedham staff 138M 22 Aug 23:36 neo4j-football.tar.gz $ tar -tvf neo4j-football.tar.gz
